question: Which of the following is not correctly matched?
option2: Chinna Bhupathi-Tribal revolt in Gulgonda in Vizag district
explanation:
After the death of Vijayaramaraju in Battle of Padmanabam his son Narayana Babu took refuge in Makkuva which is a hilly place in Vizag district.
Chinna Bhupathi was the leader of Tribal revolt in Gulgonda in Vizag district which happened from 1845-58.
